_Pragmatics_ (Fall 2021)
========================

**Course Description**: Pragmatics is concerned with people’s intentions, assumptions, beliefs, goals, and the kinds of actions they perform while using language. Pragmatics is also concerned with contexts, situations, and settings within which such language uses occur. In this class, students will learn about classic and current theories in pragmatics and how these theories can be applied to language analysis.
